hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec:
# once every two hours at 45 minutes past the hour starting at 9:45 AM and finishing at 3:45 PM every weekday. # 45 9-16/2 * * 1-5 # working default
#H 0-23/6 * * 1-5 # working 3x a day
